column1: Spells
Winds of time, gather 'round.Give me wings to speed my way.Rush me on my journey forward,Let tomorrow be today.
Mallock cormon alli-tas!(note: This is not a real spell as it was Gideon who activated the crystal with a wave of his hand behind Phoebe's back, as she read it.)
What once resided in this place,shall soon be gone with no haste.Make this girl age in time,as punishment for her heinous crime.
Caducas Exanimas Vita Aetas Anima
Let flesh be flesh and bone be bone,the Alchemist shall transform none.Cruel scientist of evil born,with these words face the fire scorn.
Magna tempus dormiebat ribus

Hear now the words of the witches,The secrets we hid in the nightâ€_The oldest of gods are invoked here,The great work of magic is sought.In this night and in this hour,I call upon the ancient power.Bring together we sisters three.Embrace the power.Unite the power!
Spirits of air, sand, and sea,converge to set the Angel free.In the wind, I send this rhyme.Bring Death before me, before my time.
Power of Three, we summon thee,And call to us the Angel of Destiny.
By the forces of Heaven and Hell,Draw to us this woman fell.Rend from her foul desire,That she may perish as a moth to fire.
By the forces of Heaven and Hell,Draw to us this woman fell.Rend from her foul desire,That she may perish as a moth to fire.
I call to thee, pure witch's fire,through vortex flow the heavenly mire.Cleanse brackish aura of debris,from dark to light, sweep history.
Ribus uero fecit orumBitis danae arcaConvenio hospito fortis mundis
Hear our call,for those who fall.Purge her to awaken,from this toxin taken.
Troubled blood with sleep's unease,Remove the cause of this disease.Sleep eternal, nevermore,And shift the source of illness borne,To this poppet whom none shall mourn.
Consilio
From Ancient times this power came,for all to have but none to reign.Take it now, show no mercy,for this power can no longer be.
Iam is addo, hic is addo.Malum quod bonus,Vox in concessus,Super dico nos.
The piercing cry that feeds on pain,and leaves more sorrow than it gains.Shall now be heard by one who seeks,to stop the havoc that it wreaks.
Magic Forces, black and white,Reaching out through space and light.Be he far or be he near,Bring us the demon Belthazor here.
Magic Forces, black and white,Reaching out through space and light.Be he far or be he near,Bring us the demon Belthazor here.
Spirits of air, forest, and seaSet us of this demon free;Beasts of hoof and beasts of shell,Drive this evil back to hell!
I take your hands in mine,And with this string I will entwine.Your powers I'll forever bind,From now until the end of time.
Give me sight through the blackest bile,Show me the faces I revile.
In this night and in this hour,I call upon the Ancient Power.Bring back my sister.Bring back the Power of Three.
Sage so fair, from far and wideTake my troubles and brush them aside.
Power of the witches rise,Course unseen across the skies.Come to us who call you near,Come to us and settle here.Blood to blood, I summon thee,Blood to blood, return to me.
Power of the sisters rise,Course unseen across the skies.Come to us who call you near,Come to us and settle here.Blood to blood, I summon thee,Blood to blood, return to me.
Bring together my prince and me,let him fall on bended knee.I summon him to my side,that he may take me to be his destined bride.
Sister spirit, we call to thee,cross on over so we may see.
Help this mother understand,the thoughts inside her little man.Though his mouth be quiet,let us hear his inner Wyatt.
Bring together, my prince and meHis kingdom now I wish to see.Crossing history to his side,from myself I will not hide.
Powers of the witches rise,course unseen across the skies.Come to us who call you near,come to us and settle here.
[Name], blood of our blood, we summon thee.
Unknown spirit, we call to thee,those who wish to set you free.Cross on over, so we may help.Come to us. Reveal yourself.
Powers of the witches rise,come to me from across the skies.Return my magic, give me back,all that was taken from the attack!
Prudence, Penelope, Patricia, Melinda,Astrid, Helena, Laura and Grace.Halliwell witches, stand strong beside us,vanquish this evil from time and space.
Marina, Teresa, Lydia.Nicolae gypsies, stand strong beside us,vanquish this evil from time and space.

I call forth from space and time,matriarchs of the Halliwell line.Mothers, daughters, sisters, friends,our family spirit without end.To gather now in this sacred place,and help us bring this child to grace.
Seven Chakras,open and bright.Cleanse the soul,and feed the light.
Evil hiding in plain sight,I use this spell with all my might.To stop your changing form and shape,this vanquish seals your fate.
I call upon the Ancient powers,to mask us now and in future hours.Hide us well and thoroughly,but not from those we call family.
Who you were, you're now another,take the face of Wyatt's brother.
Take my powers, Blessed be.Multiply their strength by three.
The perfect man I summon now,another way I don't know how.Bring him now into the light,come back to me, Mr. Right.
A perfect man we summon now,another way we don't know how.To make [name] see the light,somewhere out there is Mr. Right.
Aboleo Extum Cavium Du Eternias
When you find your path is blocked,All you have to do is knock.
From strike of twelve count twenty-four,That's how long the spell is for.Turn these gifts into a mate,And then my lonely heart abate.
Make them see, what cannot be,Flames that leap to make them flee.(note: this spell created real fire.)
On [name]'s day, set this table,with all the favors you are able.
Demons who dwell in slivers of night,uncloak your shadows to witch's sight.
Demons who dwell in slivers of night,uncloak your shadows to witch's sight.
We call on the demon Cryto,Reach back throughout the ages.Humbled by his power,We invite him into our circle.
What witches done and then undone.Return this spirit back within,and separate him from his skin.
Powers of light,Magic of right,Cast this fright,Into forever's night.
Ancient Powers, we summon thee,we the Power of Three.And seek your help in finding,the demon who is in hiding.
Sower of discord your works must cease,I vanquish thee now with these words of peace.
Sower of discord, your help we implore,I summon thee now, with these words of truce.
Evil that has traveled near,I call on you to disappear.Elementals hear my call,Remove this creature from these walls.
Sorcerer of darkness, demon of fright,I call you now into my sight.
Evil blasts we cannot use,the Power of Three now lights their fuse!

Our powers intertwine to infect the minds, the bodies, and the souls of all mortals between ocean and bay.Take this Discord we createâ€_ Turn it against the Charmed Onesâ€_Collect them for me. Hold them for me. Or kill them if you must.
Your love for me shall be no more,Make your feelings only pure.Look upon another face,There's will mine now replace.
Before the passing of this hour,Take away all their powers.

Hear now the words of the witches,The secrets we hid in the nightâ€_The oldest of Gods are invoked here,The great work of magic is sought.In this night and in this hour,I call upon the Ancient Power.Bring your powers to we sisters three!We want the power! Give us the power!
Together no more through time,expel her soul, leave only mine.
Two warring souls now burn inside,where only one can reside.I call upon the Power of Three,to save the body and set [name] free.
Time for amends and a victim's revenge.Cloning power turn sour.Power to change turn to strange.I'm rejectin' your deflection.
In the name of the Halliwell line,bar my sisters from this power of mine.
Magic forces far and wide,enchant these so those canâ€™t hide.Allow this witch to use therein,so she can reveal the evil within.
Thoughts, beliefs, ideas, truths, images.All of these you hold onto tightly,What I now mention you will release.
After this cruel memory is seen and said,erase these thoughts from my heart and my head.
Vita, Brevis, Abraxis!
What's theirs is yours,what's yours is theirs.I offer up this gift to share,switch the bodies through the air.
What's mine is yours,What's yours is mine.Let our powers cross the line.I offer up my gift to share,switch the powers through the air
Host soul reject the poison essence,Let love's light end this cruel possession.
Demon's soul hides behind an innocent's face,This witch's magic casts you out of this place.
Nine times this evil's cheated death,Felt no pain and kept his breath.This warlock standing in our midst,Let him feel what he has missed.
Locked in, boxed in, full of fear.My panic grows manic 'till I can't hear.In need of reprieve, so that I can breathe,Remove my fear, please make it leave.
Whither my love wherever you be.Through time and space,take my heart nearer to thee.
Being of creativity,we call ourselves now to thee.Your light now darkened in a ring,shall feel the Power of Three we bring.
Show me the path that I cannot find,To save [name] and restore my peace of mind.
To find good luck;Finances have run amok,creditors I soon must duck.I cast this spell to find good luck,and hope my life will cease to suck.
Lead me back from whence this came,help me help my sister's pain.
Free the empath,Release his gift.Let his pain be cast adrift.
Emergo dormio,Libertas caeles dicio.(translation: Emerge from sleep, free from heaven's dictates!)
Let this girl,quick as a sneeze.Stop this snit,and quickly freeze.
Small of mind,big of woe.The pain you caused,you now will know!
Take him back, take him away.Remove him now, don't let him stay.We call the spirits to help undo,and send him off to Timbuktu.
Hear these words, hear the rhyme,heed the hope within my mind.Send me back to where I'll find,what I wish in place and time.
Hear these words, hear the rhyme,heed the hope within my mind.Send me back to where I'll find,what I wish in place and time.
Free our souls from their shells,see where the lost spirits dwell.Long enough to find their pain,quick enough to return again.
Heart to thee,Body to thee.Always and forever,So mote it be.
I call the powers, blessed be,to make my sisters happy!
Claws of pain, we have to sever.Demon you are gone forever!
Power of Three, unite!End this grisly fright.Reverse the roles,and make us whole!
As flame lights shadow and truth ends fear,Open locked thoughts to my mind's willing ear.May the smoke from this candle into everywhere creep,Bringing innermost voices to my mind in speech.
My love is strong, my spirit weak,it is an answer that I seek.The question burns within this fire,so I may hear my heart's desire.
By Asteria and Perses:Open sky and do your worst!
Hellspawn demon, creature of death,fire shall take your very breath!
Branch of Hemlock do your deed,blood of life, will you impede.Poisoned bark will stop the breath,and in the end will bring death.
Hide [him/her] from sight, so I might fight.Ignore which leaves bereft, [name] from the Angel of Death.
Blinking faces, blank and ho-hum,we are they and they are no one.Grant to us the Power of Three,and turn them into no-body.
Blinking faces, blank and ho-hum,we are they and they are no one.Grant to us the Power of Three,and turn them into no-body.
Lock of hair completes our goal,to help us reclaim our sister's soul.Banish this demon, spare no pain,bring Phoebe back from the ghostly plane.
Wanton powers in this blade yield,penetrate that which would shield.
Wanton powers in this blade yield,penetrate that which would shield.
Let cruelty, pain and evil ways,Follow this villain through all his days.Reverse the torment he creates,To turn on him a crueler fate.
Let cruelty, pain and evil ways,Follow this villain through all his days.Reverse the torment he creates,To turn on him a crueler fate.
Blessed with powers from my destiny,I bless this hero with invincibility.'
Evil Eyes, look unto thee.may they soon extinguished be.Bend thy will to the Power of Three,eye of earth, evil and accursed!
The darkness within cannot be undone.Embrace your true self!

Hear now the words of the witches,The secrets we hid in the nightâ€_The oldest of spells are invoked here,The great gift of magic is sought.In this night and in this hour,We call upon the ancient power.Bring your power to we sisters three!We want the power! Give us the Power!
Come to me, Kali.I conjure thee, Kali.
I call to thee, pure witch's fire,through vortex flow the heavenly mire.Cleanse brackish karma of debris,from dark to light, sweep history.
Evil Witch in my sight,Vanquish thy self,Vanquish thy might.In this and every future life.
Through this book weave this spell,create the pain of Heaven and Hell.May she suffer until she cries,her tears will run and then she dies.
Hell threw you from its inner core,but Earth won't hold you anymore.Since Heaven cannot be your place,your flesh and blood we now erase.
Where royals once lived, so did she.Bring forth the naked lady from the eleventh century.
MarbhfhÃ¡isc ort(translation: You shroud)
Go n-Ã©irÃ_ an bÃ_thar laet!Let luck reveal what can't been seen.
Demon hide your evil face,Libris die and leave no trace.
We look to find the evil set free,bring this demon before us three.
Your love will wither and depart from my life and my heart.Let me be, [name], and go away forever.
Guiding spirits I ask your charity,lend me your focus and clarity.Lead me to the one I cannot find,Restore that and my peace of mind.
I conjure thee, I conjure thee,I'm the Queen, you're the Bee.As I desire, so shall it be.
The brutal winter gives way to flowers of spring.Ludlow is vanquished.
Hear these words, hear my rhymebless these two in this time.Bring them both into the fold,help them now cross love's threshold.
Being of creativity,show yourself now to me.Your light that shines upon our face,let our vision now embrace.
Being of creativity,hide yourself now from me.Your light that shines upon our face,from our vision now erase.
Little boy's bear,show me how you care.Show me how you'd feel,if you were real.
Make him hear what isn't there,his deepest worries come to bear.
May peace and love from the moon above,flow through your heart on the wings of a dove.
Favour us, sister moon, with your protective beams.Give all who dwell within this spell,safe days and sweet dreams.For those who dwell underneath this roof.
Outside of time, outside of gain!Know only sorrow, know only pain!
Powers and emotions tied,a witch's heart is where it hides.Help her through her agony,bless her with her memory.
Moments lost make witches wonder:Warlocks plot or Demon's plunder?If this is not a prank,help us to fill in the blanks.
Let the truth be told,let our lives unfold.So we can relive our memories,and stop being enemies.
Water, rise up from the sea,find the one who fled from me.Follow where the winds are cold,then fall tenfold like days of old.
Life to life and mind to mind,our spirits now will intertwine.We meld our souls and journey to,the one whose thoughts we wish we knew.
Life from life and mind from mind,Our spirits now will disentwine.We part our souls and journey home,to let our thoughts be on their own.
Freedom's lost must be unwitting,into the glass, to do my bidding.
Hear these words, hear the rhyme.We send to you this burning sign.Then our future selves we'll find,In another place and time.
Saqqara tiet ushebti
Khet mastaba hotep ka
Dromos wabet khufu nemes akh
Absolvo amitto amplus brevis.Semper mea.
Lavender, Mimosa, Holy Thistle,cleanse this evil from our midst.Scatter its cells throughout time,let this Nick no more exist.
Demon of fire, demon of pain,I banish you to the astral plane!
In this place and in this hour,we call upon the Ancient Power.Open the door through time and space,create a path to another place.
Order of Evil, I seek you with this call!With the Power of Three, we wish you gone!We vanquish thee, one and all!
They have no right, they have no power,turn their hate-sticks into flowers.
Remove the chains of time and space,and make my spirit soar.Let these mortal arms embrace,the life that haunts before.
In this time and in this place,Take this spirit I displace.Bring her forth, while I go back,To inhabit a soul so black.
We call upon Medusa's bones,turn their flesh into stone.
We call upon Ancient lore,to punish with the Power of Four.Strike down this threat from both there and here,make him suffer, then disappear!
The Power of Three will set us free!The Power of Three will set us free!The Power of Three will set us free!
Supreme demonic powers,leave your host,and find a new home,in this willing heart.
Evil is a faithful foe,but good does battle best,We witches will, with these wordswaste this warlock's evil zest.
From this moment on your pain is erased,Your bad luck as well.Enjoy your good luck [name],You're free from this hell.
These words will travel through the minds,of stubborn parties and unbind;the thoughts too rigid to be kind,a compromise they'll dis-entwine.
EimoDamaSaytoMundo
Eccere, oh, gee,Ac mando ma mento.(translation: Behold, oh, bring forth and command my will!)
From whence they came, return them now;vanish the words, vanish our powers.
Evil taints what was once held dear,remove this curse away from here.
We call upon the mortal ways,and gods who guide but may not stay.We seek those of divinity,to separate from and set them free.
This witch's power cannot fight,the lure of evil's magic might.Before misuse lands her in hell,remove the powers of Phoebe Halliwell.
For all the world to work as one,in harmony it must be undone.
Personal loss should not be mine,restore this [object] and make it fine.
Pass your petty jealousies to darkest night.Let these feuding siblings no longer fight.
We call to you that away was torn,return master of all evil born.
Take us back from whence we came.To Time and place that are the same.Let past be present.That time regain.
Take this beast, before I end her.Ship her back, return to sender.
A time for everything,and to everything its placeReturn what has been movedthrough time and space.
Powers of the witches rise, Come to me from across the skies. Return my magic, give me back All that was taken from the attack.
A sister split into body and soul,What was asunder must be remade whole.Let her body and spirit reunite,So the Power of Three can join the fight.
Open Phoebe's heart to Cole,reveal the secret that it holds.Bring forth the passion of love's fire,that he may feel her true desire.
Return thy love wherever she be.Through time and space,bring her back to me.
I call upon the Halliwell's,I call our powers to undo this spell.Make right again, that we must,reverse the curse that made this mutt.
What was awakened from its sleep,Must once again slumber deep.Return the disease to whence it came,So life can ease back to the same.
[Name], blood of our blood, we release you.
I call upon Ancient Powers,to unmask us now and in future hours.Show us well and thoroughly,reveal ourselves so the world can see.
Undo the magic acted here,reverse the spell so all is clear.
Guided spirits, hear our plea.Annul this magic, let it be.
Spell was cast,now make it past.Remove it now,don't ask me how.
I return what I didn't want to find.Let it be out of sight, out of mind.
Eniw der ni liob,stun elteeb puc.Riah fo kcol s'revol dda,stoor ekardnam owt.
In this time and in this place,Take this spirit I displaced.Bring me forth while she goes back,To a soul so black.
Reverse the spell from the book,and please restore what was took.
You who found me in this bar,turn back to who you really are.
Let the object of objection return,so that its existence may be reaffirmed.
Eerf su tes lliw,eerht fo rewop eht,
Llewd swodahs erehw krad ot nruter,thgif ot gnorts oot eno ma I.
The past is the future,and the future is the past.Let's welcome back the senior class!
Borne from the Earth of the UnderworldBound with the soil of the Ancient Burial GroundAnointed by the blood of the innocentAriseArise and ReawakenThe Source of all Evil.
When in the circle that is home,safety's gone and evils roam.Rid all beings from these walls,save us sisters three now heed our call.
Powers of the witches rise,find the hag who speaks in lies.Balance chakra, focus chi,lead us through the cruel, cruel sea.
Beloved unknown spirit, we seek your guidance.We ask that you commune with us and move among us.
Show me what the evil sees,even if at lightning speeds.
In this tween time, this darkest hour,we call upon the sacred power.Three together stand alone,command the unseen to be shown.In innocence we search the skies,Enchanted are our new found eyes.
Scrying secrets come to me,drop again so I might see.
Knowledge gained by murderous means,is wisdom's bitter enemy.The mind that burns with stolen fire,will now become your funeral pyre.
Come to me and be seduced,I have a girl to introduce.Fall for her, you can't resist her,trust me mister, she's my sister!
I beseech all powers above.Send a sign to free my sister's heart,One that will lead her to her love.
Son in the future, son in the past,seeing anew what once had passed.Return him now from whence he came,right when he left, all now the same.
From lands afar in time and space,take her now from this our place.One that dwells so must remain,send her back to her domain.
From lands afar in time and space,take them now from this our place.Two that dwell so must remain,send them back to their domain.
Scindo Singulus Seco.
Scindo Singulus Seco.

Auger de gomay, auger de gomay,Ancient one of the Earth so deepMaster of moon and sunI shield you in my Wiccan wayHere in my circle roundAsking you: protect this spaceAnd offer your sun force down.
Ancient evil now destroyed.Others rise to fill the void.To build our strength within this hour,Leave vanquished Source, but share his power.
Evil winds that blows,that which forms below.No longer may you dwell,death takes you with this spell.
Vanquish we, three witches, cry.One final shock and then you die.
Oh singing lady of the dusk,who preys on men, turns love to lust.We hearken ye into presence,to vanquish thee evil essence.
Tide of evil washed ashore,bring its darkness evermore.With all our strength we fight this fate,make this evil obliterate.
Poppy, yar, and brisbane steepto make a potion for potent sleep.
Let we who waken from our sleep,return at once to slumber deep.
Drawing on the Power of Three,Destroy this evil entity.
Spirits, send the words from all across the land.Allow me to absorb them through the touch of either hand.For 24 hours from 7 to 7,I will understand all meaning of the words from here to heaven.
Ekat ym luos.Ekat a demrahc eno.Edart meht won.

Hear now the words of the witches,The secrets we hid in the night.The oldest of gods are invoked here,The great work of magic is sought.In this night and in this hour,We call upon the ancient power.
Give me strength and give me might,to steal a child in still of night.Darkest forces, let it be.Hear my plea, bring life to me.
Fratrem nostrum reconciliÄÅteConventum nostrum consummate
Let mind and body soar,to heights not reached before.Let limits stretch that you may catch,a new truth to explore.
I call upon the Ancient Power,to help us in this darkest hour.Let the Book return to this place,claim refuge in its rightful space.
Hear these words, hear my cry,Spirit from the other side.Come to me, I summon thee,Cross now the great divide.
With these offerings, I call on thee:Goddess of Fertility.Rise now, show us the truth,give us the gift of eternal youth.
Nos dico super in concessus,Vox bonus quod malum.Ultirusque a profugus,Addo is hic, addo is iam.
Blood to blood,I summon thee!Call my ancestor to me!
Natum Adai Necral,Dana Intan Lanok!
Demon swarm that serves as one,vanquish him from which they come.
Changing seasons changes all,life renews as creation calls.Nothing is immune, everything transmutes,so take this demon and give him roots.
Di! Ecce hora! Uxor mea, me necabit!(translation: Gods, look at the time! My wife will kill me!)
From other worlds, far and near,let's get him, the Trok, out of here.

For those who want the truth revealed,opened hearts and secrets unsealed,from now until it's now again,after which the memory ends.Those who now are in this house,will hear the truth from other's mouths.
I'd rather be rich,than a bitch.
Flowers that bring desire,make them turn into fire!
Something wicked in our midst.In human forms these spirits well,Make them animals sayeth the spell.
Something wicked in our midst,in our home where he exists.
Those who mock who I am,let them always remember when.
The bond which was not to be done,give us the power to see it undone,and turn back time to whence it was begun.
Iungo, Iunxi, Iunctum.
And so I call upon the Crone,let evil roam inside this home.
Door unlock,No magic block.
Let the object of objection become but a dream,as I cause the seen to be unseen.
Ashes to ashes, spirit to spirit.Take his soul, banish this evil.
The Power of Three we now decree!The Power of Three will set you free!The Power of Three will destroy thee!
Beast of legend, myth and lore:Give my words the power to soar,and kill this evil evermore.
Snuff this warlock, his days are done,but make him good for the ecosystem.
Snuff this warlock, his days are done,but make him good for the ecosystem.
Snuff this warlock, his days are done,but make him good for the ecosystem.
Free us from the ties that bind,of evil magic intertwined.We call upon the one who cures,he who's to the dark inured.
I am light, I am one too strong to fight.Return to dark where shadows dwell,you cannot have this Halliwell.Go away and leave my sight,and take with you this endless night.
We call upon the Ancient Powers,to summon one to save a soul.
Lexonero Bestia!Lexonero!
